title: MapColonies Deployment Configuration Schema
description: Schema for deployment config in OpenShift (for auto deploy)

name.description: The name of the Helm Chart

version.description: The version of the Helm chart to be deployed

releaseName.description: The release name for the deployment

namespace.description: The target namespace for the deployment

enabled.description: If set to false, the deployment will not be automatically deployed

valuesFiles.description: A list of relative paths to YAML values files (current directory is the location of the deployment.json file)
